content.question: The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 7 sin open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is an equivalent form for <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 14 cos x sin x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mi>cos</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi></mpadded></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses 7 cos x close parentheses open parentheses 7 sin x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi></mpadded></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 7 cos squared x minus 7 sin squared x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>7</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 7 minus 14 sin squared x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>14</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 14 cos x sin x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mi>cos</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi></mpadded></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
